tha-ap219:0.3_0: Hearing this palm tree with its trunk;
tha-ap219:1.2_0: of the lay life, and the Kinsman of the Sun,
tha-ap219:1.3_0: for the purpose of crossing over
tha-ap219:1.4_0: The fever of passion is full of passion.
tha-ap219:2.1_0: I bidding, the fire of greed,
tha-ap219:2.3_0: I penetrated the fire of delusion and the fire of delusion.
tha-ap219:2.4_0: The palm fruits of this palm tree.
tha-ap219:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap219:3.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
tha-ap219:3.4_0: to the teaching of the Buddha.
tha-ap219:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap219:4.4_0: The palm fruits of this palm tree.
tha-ap219:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap219:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Āṭānāṭiya.
tha-ap219:8.1_0: The seventh plane of palm trees with the senior monks.
